verbs.description: [V: suspended] [ARG1: red sox pitcher joe] kelly watches game from the fenway bleachers boston red sox pitcher joe kelly did n't let his six - game suspension prevent him from watching his team play he watched sunday game from the bleachers at fenway park instead weei fenway bleachers tampa bay rays joe kelly sox boston red sox
